samples.question: How has the transport system in your hometown changed in the past few decades?
samples.transcript: Well, in the past I think people usually travel by work or, by work actually. But nowadays they tend to use cars for its convenience and and it is also comfortable. Or they may use some transportation, public transportation. for instance bus, buses or train. Yeah.

samples.question: Now, do you think learning many subjects at one time is better, or learning one subject is better?
samples.transcript: To be honest, I think that each way of learning has its own parts. I mean, by learning many subjects at the same time, it is good for you, especially those who easily get bored. But in another way, if you learn many subjects at the same time, it is very hard for you to concentrate on your subject. And, and of course, learning one subject, only can help you, easy, can help you, can help you, focus more on the, the, on your study.

And, um, and of course, uh, learning one subject, uh, only can help you, uh, easy, uh, can help you, uh, can help you, um, focus more on the, the, on your study.

samples.question: Like what age or what occasion?
